info.title: reg: Simple Registry Service
info.description: This is a simple registry service that mimics a couple of canned queries one could do with an IVOA Registry (RegTAP) service.

200.description: A VOSI-capabilities document describing this service.

get.description: The output lists resourceID values and the location of the VOSI-capabilities document describing servies for that resource. The output document is in key = value (properties file) format.

200.description: A key = value list of {resourceID} = {VOSI-capabilities URL}

get.description: The output lists resourceID values and the base URL of the identified application (web site location).

200.description: A key = value list of {resourceID} = {VOSI-capabilities URL}
